DataElement.preferredName: EQ-5D-5L Questionnaire Consent Yes No Exempt
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether EQ-5D has been completed for patient, and patient has consented to future assessments.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._Permission to do something.

This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Concepts.longName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.
